column1: The Purple Pig////When a spot has over 5500 reviews
column2: I make it a point to check it out. The roommate and I walked in on Monday
column3: December 4th around when they opened at 11:30am. Luckily
column4: there were only a few parties seated
column5: so we got a table for two right away. The restaurant filled up fairly quickly
column6: so I suggest getting here early as they do not take reservations.
